name: V.E.G
description:
This is a COMPLETELY 100% ACCURATE representation of what happens when a mutated vegan with a triple broccoli launcher encounters a fast food place.

This game was made for the peanut butter jam, Heres the jams page: https://itch.io/jam/peanut-butter-jam

This game and description were co-wrote with CheeseBaron2, heres the page of that absolute LAD: https://cheesebaron2.itch.io/

CONTROLS: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.
